name: Tic Tac Toe - Deluxe HD
description:
The simple, funny and mini game Tic Tac Toe is now available on your iPad!

Tic-tac-toe(or tick-tack-toe,tick-tat-toe,tit-tat-toe) is a board game similar to Five in a Row. This game is played by two players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid.


*Features*

1. Three levels of play, meeting needs of all players.

2. Play against a nearby player via Bluetooth or your friend on the same device with Two Players mode.

3. Enable to save game progress and load it next time.

4. Great visual effect and exciting sound effects.

5. Retina display high resolution.



*Rules*

Tic Tac Toe has many other names: wick wack woe,noughts and crosses,x and o,o-x.
In this game, the two players take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The X player usually goes first. The player who succeeds in placing three respective marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game.


*****************************************************

Fatbird is greatly honoured to bring you Tic Tac Toe - Deluxe HD and will continue to add new features, please don’t hesitate to rate us, we love to see your support and suggestion!


Fatbird also brings you other games: Ludo, Mancala, Checkers, Gomoku, Dots, Othello, 4 in a Row, Chess, Backgammon
